tool_description: Creates immutable audit records for all revenue tracking and royalty calculation activities for compliance and accountability.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction being logged

user_id.description: Identifier of user performing the action

action_type.description: Type of action: calculation, payment, adjustment, report

affected_entities.description: List of entities affected by this action

description.description: Detailed description of the action taken

error_messages: Invalid transaction ID: Transaction ID must be a non-empty unique identifier.
Invalid action type: Use one of [calculation, payment, adjustment, report].
Missing entities: At least one affected entity must be specified.
Duplicate transaction: This transaction ID has already been logged.
Invalid user ID: User ID must be a valid system user identifier.
usage: Provide transaction ID, user ID, action type, and affected entities. Optionally include financial impact and description for detailed logging.

audit_record_id.description: Unique identifier for the audit record

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the record was created

status.description: Status of the audit log entry

record_hash.description: Hash of the audit record for integrity verification
